article1.p1: Article Title Goes Here Each page has its own external XML file, which allows you to edit each Content Page without ever needing to open Flash. You can edit the Images, Text, and Links directly from an external XML file. You can style the HTML with the included EXTERNAL CSS style sheet. Allowing you to change font, size, color, font-weight, etc. Simply open the XML file for the page you want to edit, and change the titles, subtitles, text, hyperlinks and photos.
